text: Islaam diinit culaanam dirki maliiy num kah madirkisima Nummah cakki deedalak Baxxaqqa iyye, Toysa Yallak kalah uqbuddu haanamal koroositeeh inki Yalla Nummayse num, Toysa Nummah usuk diinik Aggiriqqe wayta Qoroy diggi itta yibbixiteh, Yalli isi Naqoosah maxcooca yaabbi ken Niyaayit tanim yaaxigi kinni
